headline: Is It Time To Reassess Albemarle (ALB) After Its 125% One Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Albemarle’s current share price lines up with its fundamentals, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about value. The stock last closed at US$165.76, with returns of 0.5% over 7 days, 2.8% over 30 days, 15.2% year to date and 125.2% over the past year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at a 35.8% decline and 6.8% respectively. Recent coverage of Albemarle has focused on its role as a key supplier to electric vehicle and energy...
